long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the ultimate WhatsApp companion with "WaSendPlus - WhatsApp CRM & ChatGPT". This powerful Chrome extension brings ChatGPT's AI-powered insights and tips right into your WhatsApp chat, taking your messaging experience to a whole new level.

Features:
Magic Reply with Conversation by ChatGPT & Tuning:
Voice-to-Text AI Assistant for Chat Transcription:
Marketing Messages Rewriter:
Customize Prompts for Personalised Interactions:
Privacy Filter for WaSendPlus - WhatsApp CRM & ChatGPT:
Guide Responses to Match Your Goal:


Utilize ChatGPT for a Multitude of Tasks:
Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT for a wide range of tasks. From content generation to brainstorming, WaSendPlus - WhatsApp CRM & ChatGPT is your versatile AI assistant.

Download "WaSendPlus - WhatsApp CRM & ChatGPT" now and experience the future of messaging!



WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. WA Send Plus is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
